mapper.select: select t2.id, t2.resources_name as resourcesName, t2.resources_url as resourcesUrl, t2.menu_id as menuId, t2.creator, t2.create_time as createTime, t2.`status` from tb_sys_permission_resources t1,tb_sys_resources t2 where t1.resources_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, resources_name as resourcesName, resources_url as resourcesUrl, menu_id as menuId, creator, create_time as createTime, `status` FROM tb_sys_resources where id not in (select t2.id from tb_sys_permission_resources t1,tb_sys_resources t2 where t1.resources_id = t2.id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.permission_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and `status` = '1'
